More than
just returns

Prioritising only Return on Investment has always been the investment culture in our Financial World. However, our company culture seeks to go beyond that boundary and redefine the true meaning of successful Return.

Mission

Terminology of more than just returns

Return on Earth

With our projects, We seek to contribute to a greener world improving our true quality of life in future.

Return on Life

With our existence, We seek to connect valuable stories for creating a positive impact on life.

Return on Effort

With our culture, We seek to encourage startups to break past those previous monetary failures.

Return on Investment

With our company, We seek to create financial returns exceeding expectations.

Our guiding principle

We group
the power

Anyone can be part of the greatness

We invest
the potentials

For People - Home - Business

We share
not just return

There are problems that money cant fix

We execute
the trust

We always seek for a better decision

J Wang

CEO of Thalassic Capital

J Wang is the Chief Executive Officer and founder of Thalassic Capital with responsibility for crafting real estate strategies, management of the company and mitigating risks.

Dominic Lim

CFO of Thalassic Capital

Dominic Lim is the Chief Financial Officer and founder of Thalassic Capital with responsibility for implementing financial strategies, execution of investment and corporate venturing.
